description: Robot Framework Test Results Grafana Dashboard

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM test_cases_status
        JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
        JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
        JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE status = 'PASS' AND country_code = '$language' AND test_site.label = '$test_site' AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
    ) as PASS,
    (SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM test_cases_status
        JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
        JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
        JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE status = 'FAIL' AND country_code = '$language' AND test_site.label = '$test_site' AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
    ) as FAIL,
    (SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM test_cases_status
        JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
        JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
        JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE status = 'SKIP' AND country_code = '$language' AND test_site.label = '$test_site' AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
    ) as SKIP

SELECT (
        SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM
            test_cases_status
            JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
            JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
            JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE
            status = 'PASS'
            AND country_code = '$language'
            AND test_site.label = '$test_site'
            AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
    ) / (
        SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM
            test_cases_status
            JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
            JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
            JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE
            country_code = '$language'
            AND test_site.label = '$test_site'
            AND $__timeFilter(started_at) 
    ) * 100

SELECT
    name AS "Test Cases",
    elapsed AS "Elapsed (s)",
    status AS Status,
    CONVERT_TZ(started_at, "UTC", "+07:00") AS "Tested at"
FROM
    test_cases_status
    JOIN test_cases ON test_cases_status.test_case_id = test_cases.id
    JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    status = "FAIL"
    AND label = '$test_site'
    AND country_code = '$language'
    AND $__timeFilter(started_at);

SELECT SUM(elapsed)
FROM
    test_cases_status
    JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    country_code = '$language'
    AND test_site.label = '$test_site'
    AND $__timeFilter(started_at)

SELECT SUM(elapsed)
FROM
    test_run_status
    JOIN test_runs ON test_run_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    label = '$test_site'

SELECT (
        SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM test_cases_status
            JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
            JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE
            status = 'PASS'
            AND test_site.label = '$test_site'
    ) / (
        SELECT COUNT(status)
        FROM test_cases_status
            JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
            JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
        WHERE
            test_site.label = '$test_site'
    ) * 100

SELECT COUNT(test_run_status.id)
FROM
    test_run_status
    JOIN test_runs ON test_run_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    label = '$test_site';

SELECT COUNT(test_cases_status.id)
FROM
    test_cases_status
    JOIN test_runs ON test_cases_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    label = '$test_site';

SELECT AVG(elapsed)
FROM
    test_run_status
    JOIN test_runs ON test_run_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    label = '$test_site'

targets.query: SELECT sum("rf_failed") FROM "autogen"."testcase_point" WHERE ("project_name"='$project_name') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "rf_name"
targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    name as TestSuites,
    elapsed as "Elapsed (s)",
    passed as PASS,
    failed as FAIL,
    status as Status,
    CONVERT_TZ(started_at, "UTC", "+07:00") as "Tested at"
FROM suite_status
    JOIN suites ON suite_status.suite_id = suites.id
    JOIN test_runs ON suite_status.test_run_id = test_runs.id
    JOIN localized ON test_runs.localized_id = localized.id
    JOIN test_site ON test_runs.test_site_id = test_site.id
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(started_at)
    AND country_code = '$language'
    AND label = '$test_site';

title: Robot Framework Grafana Dashboard
